name: AzureKeyVault
releaseNotes: Works with cross-platform agents (Linux, macOS, or Windows)
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure subscription for the key vault

inputs.name: KeyVaultName
inputs.label: Key vault
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of an existing key vault

inputs.name: SecretsFilter
inputs.label: Secrets filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of secret names or leave * to download all secrets from the selected key vault.

inputs.name: RunAsPreJob
inputs.label: Make secrets available to whole job
inputs.helpMarkDown: Run the task before job execution begins. Exposes secrets to all tasks in the job, not just tasks that follow this one.
